author: Pashizzle500

text: One of the few tracks composed by Richard Jacques, I like how fitting it is to the grandiose Citadel. The first time I walked around the Citadel, I remember thinking it'd be pretty cool to live there. Jack Wall's synthetic sound is the reason this game has my favorite soundtrack in the series. Jacques was probably inspired to use some of that same sound in this track with the background bells throughout the track (which you can hear solo right at the end).
author: SupraDarky
